channel.title: esp32 on xistor's notes
channel.description: Recent content in esp32 on xistor's notes

item.title: Failed to connect to ESP32: Timed out waiting for packet header
item.description: 20几块淘宝淘了一块Esp32-Cam, 网上也有很多配置教程， 环境配置没有什么大的问题，但在烧写固件的时候遇到了下面的错误： Looking for upload port... Auto-detected: /dev/ttyUSB0 Uploading .pio/build/nodemcu-32s/firmware.bin
